Reviews.Title: Very good phone
Reviews.Author: JOSE PRIETO
Reviews.Content: Very good smartphone, I recommend itDesktop is very fast, and 512Mb of RAM is enough for me.Camera is OK compared with Apple and Samsung, 8Mp interpolated I guessMy only con is about battery life. 1 day and to charge again

Reviews.Title: So far, so good.
Reviews.Author: Mihir Choksi
Reviews.Content: I brought this phone a week above, over all it is good but not very good at this price. Screenn resolution and touch screen are ok but not like branded phones obviously price matters here. RAM is not good enough to run some of the heavy games or apps. I notice it while playing Temple Run.  This is intital the observatios only.

Reviews.Title: Excellent quality and value
Reviews.Author: Egbert Serrano
Reviews.Content: Excellent quality and value.Totally was received as described.Totally fast and in excellent condition.The quality of the images are Good.the connectivity is fast.It recognizes all the mobile devices and provides fast connection nearby.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Marquetta F.
Reviews.Content: I would have gave five star but I was disappointed in how long it took to get the phone almost a month. Overall I love my phone its big an nice I couldnt got a better phone...

Reviews.Title: great phone
Reviews.Author: john stalbaum
Reviews.Content: I have had this phone for about a month, and have had no problems with it, that is except for the fact that the headphone jack requires a 4 connection 16 mm pin (as opposed to the standard 14 mm). After a little trial and error i found that the JVC HAFX5B Gumy Plus Inner Ear Headphones work just fine once you cut back the base a couple of mm, easily done with just a sharp knife.they have pretty good sound too. I would recommend this phone to anyone looking to get on the big phone bandwagon without spending too much money. If it wasn't for the problem with the headphone I would have given this phone 5 stars.

Reviews.Title: Works well
Reviews.Author: NC
Reviews.Content: For the price I got this, it is extremely good. I connect to office network and home network, and occasionally to a Mifi device.  So did not test Sim card, and am not intending to use it.  Everything else works as per expectation (not as great as iPhone, but the price makes a huge difference).  Also, initially they said it will take about a month, but came in about 2.5 weeks (so +1 for that).
